jsonSchema.title: MS Exchange - The indexing of mailbox database encountered an unexpected exception

start_Service_Switch.title: Select this switch to start the Exchange Search related services if set to Automatic but not started.

restartService.title: Please select this switch to restart all the Search related services on this server.

fixPrimaryDatabase.title: Select this switch to rebuild the Search index of primary (Active) mailbox database.

fixPassiveCopies.title: Select this switch to rebuild the Search index of Passive mailbox database copy in case of DAG.

createContentSubmittersSwitch.title: Please select this switch to create CONTENTSUBMITTERS group in the AD (if not already present).

quarentinemailboxRepairRequest_switch.title: Select this switch to start mailbox repair request for all specified the mailboxes.

testExchangeSearch.title: Please select this switch to perform Exchange search on specified Mailbox Database(s).

testExchangeSearchDatabaseName.title: Please enter the name of the Database to perform exchange search test.(E.g. DB1, DB2..)

quarentinemailboxName.title: Please provide the mailbox name(s) to initiate the repair request.

activedatabaseName.title: Please provide the datbase name(s) to initiate the repair request.(E.g. DB1, DB2..)

passivedatabaseName.title: Please provide the database name(s) to initiate the repair request.(E.g. DB1, DB2..)

start_Service_Switch.ui:help: This switch will try starting MSExchangeFastSearch, HostControllerService

fixPassiveCopies.ui:help: The passive copies of teh databases on the server will get updated

fixPrimaryDatabase.ui:help: The .single folder in the datbase folder will be renamed, all the search related services will be restarted

restartService.ui:help: This switch will try restarting MSExchangeFastSearch, HostControllerService

testExchangeSearchDatabaseName.ui:help: Please provide the database names seperated by comma. e.g. DB1, DB2, DB3, 'Database Name 4'..

quarentinemailboxName.ui:help: Please provide the mailbox names seperated by comma. e.g. MB1, MB2, MB3, 'Mailbox Name 4'..

createContentSubmittersSwitch.ui:help: This group is just a placeholder to make content indexing to work. You can try creating this group in case if rebuilding of search on the database doesn't help. Also make sure to inform the MSP (partner) about creation of this group. Note:- Script will add full permission to Administrator and Network Service account on this group
